title: Hailey Bieber dons colorful jumpsuit for a girls night out ... days after tying the knot with Justin
text:
She wrote in an Instagram story earlier on Sunday that while 'Saturdays are for the boys... Sundays are for the wife,' but it appears Hailey Bieber was taking some time on Sunday for herself.

The 22-year-old model was spotted out with some girlfriends wearing a colorfully tie-dyed jumpsuit.

She wore her blonde locks up in a sleek bun with a middle part that framed her face.

'Sundays are for' ...whatever I want! Hailey Bieber, 22, was spotted out with some girlfriends wearing a colorfully tie-dyed jumpsuit

She paired the look with some golden stilettos, accessorizing with a pair of golden hoop earrings.

A small Louis Vuitton crossbody bag hung over her chest as she was seen walking with friends.

Her friends looked equally fashionable donning black and denim looks.

Meanwhile, Justin Bieber, 25, was photographed alone as he hopped into his ride in a grey sweatshirt and black hat.

Designer: A small Louis Vuitton crossbody bag hung over her Hailey's chest as she was seen walking with friends

Solo: Meanwhile, Justin Bieber, 25, was photographed alone as he hopped into his ride in a grey sweatshirt and black hat

Earlier on Sunday, the newly married model posted a snap to her Instagram story of herself and her husband in bed.

She also posted a cute video as she reminded her husband of one year that 'Saturdays are for the boys, and Sundays are for the wife.'

The pop singer's mom, Pattie Mallette, also recently took to Instagram to gush about her new daughter-in-law.

Following last weekend's wedding, Mallette wrote in a comment: 'You have truly been blessed with a BEAUTIFUL bride, son. INSIDE AND OUT!'

Lazy Sunday: Earlier on Sunday, the newly remarried model posted a snap to her Instagram story of herself and her husband in bed

Mom-in-law: Following last weekend's wedding, Mallette wrote in a comment: 'You have truly been blessed with a BEAUTIFUL bride, son. INSIDE AND OUT'

'I don’t think I could have picked a better match for you. You are a gift to each other. I am grateful and consistently humbled by the love and blessings of God over you both. My mamas heart is full. Okay. Here we go again,' she continued.

The comment appeared under her son's post of his music video for 10,000 Hours.

He and Mrs. Beiber appear in the video, putting on a romantic display in a bed surrounded by lush flowers.

The video dropped last week, the same day the couple stripped down to their undies to appear in Calvin Klein's new campaign for the brand's 50th birthday.
